ack.p: This work was funded by FEDER (FCOMP-01-0124-FEDER-010564 and FCOMP-01-0124-FEDER-020817), FCT (PTDC/MAR/099391/2008, PTDC/MAR/117568/2010, SFRH/BD/68521/2010 and IF/00043/2012), NASA (NNX11AP77G) and NSF (OCE1129401). The comments of Sarah A. Woodin contributed significantly to the quality of this study. This is contribution 82 in Ecological Forecasting from the University of South Carolina.
